ValidationRule.description: Employee number is required to all Paychex Employee users. Non-Paychex Employee users must be indicated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (BEGINS(Profile.Name , "2008-09") && LEN(EmployeeNumber)=0 && NOT( Non_Paychex_Employee__c )) || (BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "2008-09") && LEN(EmployeeNumber)=0 && NOT( Non_Paychex_Employee__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** Employee number is required to all Paychex Employee users. Non-Paychex Employee users must be indicated ****
